conbody.p: NS primarily determines notification content and delivery channels and delivers the notifications. NCC apps (Charging and Policy) send triggers to the Notification Service. If multiple NS are available in the network, these triggers are load balanced through an IOH. After evaluating whether and when a notification should be sent, NS sends out the notification through appropriate channels. The subscriber and device notification preferences are available in NS as notification profiles.

li.p: NS receives notification requests from other NCC components.
NS takes into account subscriber preferences.

note.p: NS uses the common database along with other NCC components.
